mapper.select: SELECT IVRLOGSEQ ,NAME ,T1.PHONENUMBER ,TTS_MENT_TITLE ,TTS_MENT_INTRO_01 ,SEND_TYPE ,CALL_TYPE ,T1.CREATEDATE ,ISUSE ,IFNULL(DLKEY, '') AS DLKEY ,IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,STATUS_COMPLETION ,REC_FILE_PREFIX ,REC_FILE_NAME ,REC_FILE_URL FROM IVRLOG T1 ,( SELECT MAX(CREATEDATE) AS CREATEDATE ,PHONENUMBER FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq} GROUP BY PHONENUMBER ) T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PHONENUMBER = T2.PHONENUMBER AND T1.CREATEDATE = T2.CREATEDATE AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}

SELECT IVRLOGSEQ ,NAME ,PHONENUMBER ,TTS_MENT_TITLE ,TTS_MENT_INTRO_01 ,SEND_TYPE ,CALL_TYPE ,CREATEDATE ,ISUSE ,IFNULL(DLKEY, '') AS DLKEY ,IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,STATUS_COMPLETION ,REC_FILE_PREFIX ,REC_FILE_NAME ,REC_FILE_URL FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGSEQ = #{ivrlogseq}

SELECT IVRLOGSEQ ,NAME ,PHONENUMBER ,TTS_MENT_TITLE ,TTS_MENT_INTRO_01 ,CALL_TYPE ,AUTOCALLCNT ,AUTOCALLCYCLE ,NEXTCALL_DATE ,CALLRESPONSEDATE ,CALLSTARTDATE ,CALLENDDATE ,CALLDURATION ,RESULT ,RESULT_MESSAGE ,USER_INPUT ,VOICE_RECEIVE ,REC_VOICE_RECEIVE ,CREATEDATE ,UPDATEDATE ,DELETEDATE ,ISUSE ,IFNULL(DLKEY, '') AS DLKEY ,IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,STATUS_COMPLETION ,USERSESSIONID ,GROUP_IDENTIFIER ,PERSONAL_IDENTIFIER ,REC_FILE_PREFIX ,REC_FILE_NAME ,REC_FILE_URL ,FOR_ELECTION FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND SEND_TIME = 'B' AND NEXTCALL_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{nextcallDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i')
mapper.update: UPDATE IVRLOG SET STATUS_COMPLETION = 'I' WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGSEQ = #{ivrlogseq}

UPDATE IVRLOG SET ISUSE = 'N' ,DELETEDATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y'
AND IVRLOGSEQ IN (${ivrlogseqArr})
AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ IN (${ivrlogmapperseq})

UPDATE IVRLOG SET ISUSE = 'N' ,DELETEDATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND NEXTCALL_DATE > NOW()
AND IVRLOGSEQ IN (${ivrlogseqArr})
AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ IN (${ivrlogmapperseq})
UPDATE IVRLOGMAPPER SET ISUSE = 'N' ,DELETEDATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}
mapper.select: SELECT IVRLOGSEQ ,NAME ,PHONENUMBER ,TTS_MENT_TITLE ,TTS_MENT_INTRO_01 ,CALL_TYPE ,SEND_TYPE ,SEND_TIME ,REPEAT_TYPE ,AUTOCALLCNT ,AUTOCALLCYCLE ,NEXTCALL_DATE ,CALLRESPONSEDATE ,CALLSTARTDATE ,CALLENDDATE ,CALLDURATION ,RESULT ,RESULT_MESSAGE ,USER_INPUT ,VOICE_RECEIVE ,REC_VOICE_RECEIVE ,CREATEDATE ,UPDATEDATE ,DELETEDATE ,ISUSE ,IFNULL(DLKEY, '') AS DLKEY ,IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,STATUS_COMPLETION ,USERSESSIONID ,GROUP_IDENTIFIER ,PERSONAL_IDENTIFIER ,REC_FILE_PREFIX ,REC_FILE_NAME ,REC_FILE_URL FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND SEND_TIME = 'C' AND NEXTCALL_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{nextcallDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i')
mapper.update: UPDATE IVRLOGMAPPER SET SEND_TIME = 'A' ,UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}
UPDATE IVRLOGMAPPER SET RESERVATION_DATE = #{nextcallDate} ,UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND SEND_TIME = 'C' AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}
mapper.select: SELECT IVRLOGSEQ ,NAME ,T1.PHONENUMBER ,TTS_MENT_TITLE ,TTS_MENT_INTRO_01 ,SEND_TYPE ,SEND_TIME ,CALL_TYPE ,T1.CREATEDATE ,ISUSE ,IFNULL(DLKEY, '') AS DLKEY ,IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,STATUS_COMPLETION ,REC_FILE_PREFIX ,REC_FILE_NAME ,REC_FILE_URL FROM IVRLOG T1 ,( SELECT MAX(CREATEDATE) AS CREATEDATE ,PHONENUMBER FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq} AND NEXTCALL_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PHONENUMBER ) T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PHONENUMBER = T2.PHONENUMBER AND T1.CREATEDATE = T2.CREATEDATE AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq} AND NEXTCALL_DATE = #{nextcallDate}
SELECT * FROM IVRLOG WHERE 1=1 AND IVRLOGSEQ = #{ivrlogseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE IVRLOGMAPPER SET ROUND = ROUND + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}
mapper.select: SELECT IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ ,TITLE ,CALLER_ID ,SEND_TIME ,RESERVATION_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATEDATE ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATEDATE ,DATE_FORMAT(DELETEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS DELETEDATE ,ISUSE ,DLKEY ,ROUND ,IFNULL(ORIGIN_SEQ, IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ) AS ORIGIN_SEQ FROM IVRLOGMAPPER WHERE 1=1 AND IVRLOGMAPPERSEQ = #{ivrlogmapperseq}
